content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see you have a newly built one-bedroom apartment in the city center. That's quite nice. I am a student and I am looking for a quiet place to live. How much do you want for the rent?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's quite high for an unfurnished 50 square meter apartment. I would expect the rent to be lower.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Well, Max, the apartment is in the city center and close to all important facilities. I can't lower the price, I'm afraid.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but I have seen similar apartments in the same area for a lower price. I am willing to pay €700 per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're offering is too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can see your point. How about €800 per month? That's a good middle ground.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're offering is still too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're offering is still too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
